text:
Education: MS in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 2
Date of the Offer: May 2021
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: SDE1
Location: Seattle, WA
Salary: $130,000
Relocation: $7,000
Signing Bonus: $47,000 (first year), $36000 (second year)
Stock bonus: 28 RSU's vested over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~$180K
